Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by the AACR Cancer Immunology Working Group Working Group. The 2022 CIMM Town Hall will feature three presentations on the most current and controversial topics in the cancer immunology community on the theme of Targets and Biomarkers for Cancer Prevention. Topics will include Targets for Cancer Prevention, Cancer Prevention and Metabolism, and Biomarkers in Cancer Prevention. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session
Location: Jefferson Ballroom, Hilton New Orleans Riverside
SearchResultBody: TM03. Cancer Prevention Working Group (CPWG) Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
